amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS) funding by $11.7 million to combat methamphetamine production and trafficking, and decrease International Broadcasting Operations funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funding by $11.7 million (by transfer) for the methamphetamine lab seizures program by the DEA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lucas (OK) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 227 (Roll no. 233).
